title: LF ADC and MID for an Auspicious Gaming Team, Gold+
body:
Hello, I am the captain of Adam's Family, known as Nutella Fella.

We are currently looking for an ADC to play for our main roster.

Requirements:
Gold 1 or Higher.
Available afternoons and/or evenings at least 2 days of the week.
None/Low toxicity.
Communication etiquette.

For details on Auspicious Gaming organisation go to [Here](http://www.auspiciousgaming.com)

Edit 1: No longer need midlaner, applications now on are for ADC only.
